title: Digital Mathematics Competency Development Program for Construction Engineering Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Engineering Mathematics Knowledge and Construction Site Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Designed to strengthen job competencies of current construction professionals, offering practice-centered education using digital tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform mathematical modeling using graphing calculators and dynamic geometry software to solve construction site problems.
Learners improve accuracy in solving basic construction math problems (e.g., linear equations, area calculations) by over 30% using digital tools.
Learners can share and refine real-time problem-solving strategies with peer learners via a collaboration platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
